assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Ryomo Systems Co.,Ltd. provides software development and system sales, information processing, product-related sales, and other information services in Japan. It offers administrative, family register information comprehensive, financial accounting, counter support, smart lunch, smart city, and collection management solutions; water tariff adjustment, public enterprise accounting system, image information management system, as well as toll collection, water supply equipment management, and other services to water supply entities; and educational network construction, school affairs and class support, and library management services. The company also provides customer portals for gas and electricity retailing; customer rate management, gas business management, and other solutions for energy industry; and solutions for manufacturing industry, including SAP ERP implementation, business specific template RAICs, and other solutions. In addition, it offers printing solutions; functional safety solutions; MBD consulting, automation tool, contract development, and education training solutions, as well as HILS support solutions; medical solutions, such as medical office, drug management guidance service support, and ordering, electronic medical chart systems, and other solutions; and solutions for sales and customer management, online shopping, POS data analysis, e-commerce, and labor scheduling programs in the distribution sector. Further, the company provides secure cloud, online storage, security reporting, backup, housing, cyberattack counter measure, network, data center, and facility equipment services, as well as data entry, website design, and meter data information creation solutions. The company was incorporated in 1970 and is headquartered in Kiryu, Japan. Ryomo Systems Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Mitsuba Corporation.
